post.body: Oh. I must look taller due to the lack of hair. Well, remind me I was flirting with you when you meet me so I don't forget. ;-)
I have the same problem when I try to get off at the first brown line stop just north of the river. Doors just don't open for me.
LOL!!! Awesome honesty. ;-) I figured you had a spin to make it valid or your legal team would freak. Nice play.
I'll have to meet you in person some time to make the blonde determination myself. I'm 5'9" so giant mode may intimidate me. ;-)
how are you chicago's number one newspaper? (Your profile declaration.) Just curious on that spin. http://is.gd/bIj7
And I'm not even a copy editor. Just look at G'Trends and see what the masses are searching for and try to work it in. ;-)
Oh. RedEye will have a catchy headline for it you can be sure. Different demographics. Thurs huh? Sure. I'll show. Need details.
regarding headline dilemna, G'Trends states you should go with something like "Bush Shoe Attack in Iraq" http://is.gd/bIeA ur wlcm
I am just THAT good. Damn. Not only SEO but being able to guess height of attractive blondes from tiny 100pix images. Kudos 2 me
3 inch heals. You look tall in your profile pic (laughs at how crazy that sounds but feels he's right). You going for 6' w/ heel
it's for real. check out the article.
I'm the in-house SEO guy for Tribune Interactive. It includes all the newspapers, TV stations, etc. not classifieds though.
I've only heard two people all day today. But then again I am in the basement below the basement so . . . newsroom's busy on 4
throw a shoe at me?? Getting violent are we? *trembles* I just can't win on Twitter tonight @yummyman
I actually love Vista. It never crashes. Works plenty fast for me. Huge improvement. It looks a bit 'Mac-esque' though. ;-)
Thanks!! It's actually from last February. I want to get up to the flagpole (top of Trib Tower) and take some more. No time.
sorry I was a panzy and skipped out on your tweetup on Thurs. Busy week and day. Just burnt out on travelling up there. :-)
Great suggestion!! I love subways. Cheap. Easy to use. Stayed with friend in Brooklyn Heights for SMX East. Subway was perfect. Thx
Hmmm not sure if falling asleep when putting your wife to bed is a good thing. ;-) (Not THAT! Because you might snore too loud.)
Thanks for the heads up on not booking Gatwick. I'll keep that in mind & I have favorited the tweet. Cheap, safe hotel suggestion?
I fall asleep 50% of the time when I put my son to bed. I fall asleep easier putting him to bed then I do alone. Go figure. ;-)
I'll make you a deal. You can dance at the Blue Frog while I sing Karaoke. ;-) Believe me that's a better option than me dancing. ;-)
for now. I got word this week from Tribune that things look a little solid (but I'm always prepared for worst) for me for 2009.
Well. I guess I should add a disclaimer that 'Some tweets may not be suitable for children. Parental discretion advised.'
favorite place is probably The O.C. because I made 3x what I make now. To go back there with current income though. Nope!! ;-)
$500 kick ass bed at World Market and they deliver. Check them out at http://www.worldmarket.com ;-)
My sex life is worse because not too comfortable rolling back some hottie to an apt with only futon, 1 chair, & crappy bed. ;-)
Sigh...Google isn't indexing "Bush Shoe Attack in Iraq" story. Gonna have to move it to the homepage to get it indexed. http://is.gd/bIvd
Bush Shoe Attack in Iraq Video: http://is.gd/bIpL alright . . . I know this will be big but I have other things to do and CNN will own it.
Shoe Attack in Iraq (okay, I didn't change the headline but I did change the title tag): http://is.gd/bIoJ Enjoy this story @suntimes ;-)
Going to competitor's tweetup. ;-) Retweeting @Suntimes: http://zi.ma/8e7993 5:30ish Thursday - close to the Belmont stop for ur convenience
"It was a size 10", says Bush. Retweeting @amykchulik: @BrentDPayne Sigh...I'm just a copycat shoe-thrower. http://tinyurl.com/6zy5cl
You can get so so so much more work done at night when friends and co-workers aren't around to annoy you. ;-) LOL You know what I mean.
Anyone know how to kill 'determing your video quality' process on Netflix instant download via XBOX? I'd prefer to wait a bit longer for HD.
Retweet @cecilyc: Travelodge Kings Cross Royal Scot. A short Tube's ride from Islington (1 stop Victoria line) - http://tinyurl.com/8wsvaj
Contemplating heading down to the Blue Frog tonight. Anyone there or been there tonight to give me a vibe on it? Don't wanna go if it's dead
I'm gonna crash most of the extended nights at the Critchlow Bros. houses but for core conference nights, anyone want to split a hotel room?
I've I'm going to this exact location. Any specific London airport considerably better? http://is.gd/cLl0
Hell, nevermind. It's cheaper to fly from Chicago to London than it is to fly from Chicago to the Pacific Northwest.
Checking out flight costs from Chicago to London for SES London 2009. Any suggestions on places to go for low fares I may not know?
